name: Polisys
description:
Polisys is a trusted software development company with more than 13 years of professional experience. With a software development pool of professionals with strong technology skills, Polisys delivers innovative high-quality services with a cost-efficient delivery model and strong QA on its testing processes.
 
Polisys is a Mps.Br - F Certified company, which is a capability maturity model developed and recognized by Brazilian Government (CMMI- level 2 compatible). We are delivering software projects over the last 10 years to major Brazil Government Organizations on Executive, Legislative and Judicial branches.
